name: Maison Alfred sauce - 1

attributes.title: Shelf-life & Storage
attributes.details: Shelf life: 12 months. Keep refrigerated once open.

description:
An exclusive homemade sauce, with fermented mustard seed, soya and fresh ginger for a unique sweet and sharp taste. 

USE IT ON ANY DISH OR PLATE!

**Cold:** In salads, pasta, with seafood, on toast.

**Hot:** In rice, chicken, potatoes, sautéd dishes.

**As a marinade:** For chicken, turkey, white fish, vegetables.
